summary: The 'Saving the Department of Energy's Workforce Act' (S. 2595) places a moratorium on reductions in force (RIFs) at the Department of Energy (DOE) until fiscal year 2026 appropriations are enacted.  The Secretary of Energy is prohibited from initiating or implementing RIFs or conducting involuntary separations of employees (except for cause) to protect the DOE workforce.  The bill specifies definitions for covered employee types based on U.S. Code Title 5.
